actions.name: chargePointClearChargingProfile
actions.display_name: Actions - Charge Point - Clear Charging Profile
actions.description: If you are not using networkId and not passing other criteria in the body it will clear the charging profile for the charge point (ChargePointMaxProfile).

actions.name: chargePointGetInstalledCertificateIds
actions.display_name: Actions - Charge Point - Get Installed Certificate Ids
actions.description: Charge Point / Get Installed Certificate IDs.

actions.name: chargePointResetSecurityProfile
actions.display_name: Actions - Charge Point - Reset Security Profile
actions.description: Reset the current security profile of the charge point in the backend. The next time the charge point connects, the backend will accept the connection and update the current security profile with the one that the charge point actually used to establish the connection.

actions.name: chargePointStartChargingSession
actions.display_name: Actions - Charge Point - Start Charging Session

actions.name: chargePointSyncConfiguration
actions.description: Send a partial or full sync configuration request to the chargepoint. You will get back a requerstId that you can monitor the status of using the ChargePointSyncConfigurationNotification. Please note that calling this action should not be required, as each time the charge point boots the configuration is automatically synced.

actions.name: chargePointStopChargingSession
actions.display_name: Actions - Charge Point - Stop Charging Session

actions.name: sessionAssignToUser
actions.description: Assign a user to a session. This action is only applicable to sessions with Completed billing status that have no user associated with them. This operation can be done only once and is not reversible.

actions.name: sessionRetryPayment
actions.description: Retry failed payment for a session.

actions.name: tariffSetDisplayInformation
actions.description: Apply a Tariff Display Information to tariff.

actions.name: electricityMeterReportConsumption
actions.description: Add an electricity meter report for the meter readings at the current moment.

actions.name: transactionUpdatePaymentReference
actions.description: Link the transaction to external resource where the payment took place.

actions.name: transactionIssueInvoice
actions.description: Issue ad-hoc invoice for the transaction (only if AMPECO invoice integration is used). For Szmlzz.hu integration in Hungary, if a fiscalized receipt exists for the transaction, it will be automatically canceled and both the invoice and storno receipt will be sent to the user.

actions.name: transactionResendInvoice
actions.description: Resend already issued invoice. If the transaction has an associated fiscalized receipt that was automatically canceled (Hungary compliance), both the invoice and the storno receipt will be sent together.

actions.name: subscriptionPlanReplace
actions.description: Replace a subscription plan with another one.

actions.name: notificationsResendFailed
actions.description: Resend failed webhook notifications. - Resend for a specific notification ID can be requested once every 15 minutes. - Notifications that are disabled cannot be resent.

actions.name: evseStartChargingWithEvseId
actions.display_name: Actions - EVSE - Start Charging With EVSE Id

actions.display_name: Actions - Parking Spaces - Update Occupancy Status

actions.description: Create multiple variables for a specific configuration template, adds them to the already existing keys and validates if there are duplicates.

actions.name: updateCustomTariffFilterTariff

actions.description: Set the pricing data for a custom tariff filter. This action will update the underling roaming tariff and create a pricing based on it. The pricing can then be utilized by attaching a markup tariff to the tariff map of the custom tariff filter.

actions.name: userExportAllPrivateData
actions.display_name: Actions - Users - Export All Private Data

actions.name: userClearSubscriptionAmountDue
actions.display_name: Actions - Users - Clear Subscription Amount Due
actions.description: Clear a user's subscription amount due. Any unsettled transactions related to the user's current subscription  such as fees and charging sessions will be set to an amount of 0.This operation is irreversible.

actions.name: userRedeemVoucher
actions.description: Apply a voucher to a user.

actions.description: Cancel a subscription to a user.

actions.display_name: Actions - Provisioning Certificate - Certificate Issue An EMAID

actions.name: notificationsSubscribe
actions.description: Subscribe for a webhook or kafka events. Each notification sent to the webhook/kafka will be retried a number of times and will be rate limited. The rate limits, retries and retry intervals will be configured by Ampeco.

triggers.name: new_notification
triggers.description: Triggers when a webhook notification event is received from Ampeco
